headline: Is Brown-Forman Stock a Buy, Sell or Hold at a P/E Multiple of 22.4x?
summary: BF.B's premiumization strategy and global expansion efforts position it for long-term growth, though near-term headwinds remain a concern.

headline: Lidl unveils own-brand cola Christmas truck tour
summary: The 20-metre, 15-tonne truck will have Lidl’s own-brand Freeway cola label wrapped around its body.
